name: Neural Cascade
description: This intricate neural interface amplifies and focuses incoming sensory data into bursts of pure information. It allows the user to overload their senses on command, briefly experiencing the world with heightened clarity.

flavor.rationale: A high-end cybernetic upgrade designed for elite operatives requiring peak performance under pressure, it enhances reaction time by processing information faster than biological systems can. The Neural Cascade is often sought after by contract killers and corporate spies who need every advantage in tense situations.
